title: Hybrid Cryptographic Monitoring System for Side-Channel Attack Detection on PYNQ SoCs
summary: AES-128 encryption is theoretically secure but vulnerable in practical deployments due to timing and fault injection attacks on embedded systems. This work presents a lightweight dual-detection framework combining statistical thresholding and machine learning (ML) for real-time anomaly detection.
